author: sandymac
msg: * Removed the IOIterator interface, it can be added back later when there is more than one
Iterator implementations with a close method.
* Doesn't automatically close the Reader at EOF.
* made LineIterator final because the hasNext method isn't implemented in a subclassable way.
* constructor throws an IllegaArgumentException, not a NPE when the argument is bogus.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1009 Ensure EmbedResultSet.getStatement() returns the BrokeredStatement object
the application used to create it, rather than the underlying physical statament.

author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1075 - NPE in ScopedRequestImpl.registerOuterAttribute() when running without asserts.
With this change ScopedRequestImpl.registerOuterAttribute()  will log an error and return rather than throw an NPE when running without asserts.

author: jta
msg: DERBY-780  Applied Halley Pacheco de Oliveira's patch that corrects translation
errors in the Brazilian Portuguese translation of the Getting Started guide.
